channel.title: Options Screener on Options Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in Options Screener on Options Cafe

item.title: Using the options screener
item.description: One of the most powerful features of Options Cafe is the ability to screen for options to trade. This can save traders hours of searching by hand. With our screener, you can define a strategy and a set of filters. In the video below we walk through screening for a put credit spreadtrade on the SPY.
